imbecilic.Name: imbecilic
imbecilic.Description: of, relating to, or characteristic of an imbecile.

injured.Name: injured
injured.Description: to have been caused harm of any kind to; to be damaged; to be hurt; to have been impaired.

insane.Name: insane
insane.Description: not sane; not of sound mind; mentally deranged.

mostly_harmless.Name: mostly harmless
mostly_harmless.Description: for the most part incapable of causing harm.

psychotic.Name: psychotic
psychotic.Description: characterized by or afflicted with psychosis. Psychosis is a mental disorder characterized by symptoms, such as delusions or hallucinations, that indicate impaired contact with reality.

stupid.Name: stupid
stupid.Description: lacking ordinary quickness and keenness of mind; dull.
